content: mitt top continue to knit in st st across both ndls until desired length is reached leaving approximately 0 75 inch for the ribbing sample mitts approximately 16 rounds *k1 p1* x 7 row bobble loosely in ribbing copyright erica lueder & dreams in fiber 2018 for personal use only 3 thumb place thumb sts back on circular ndls while picking up 2 sts where the thumb meets the mitten body to close the gap **there should be 24 total thumb gusset sts ** knit 4 row or until desired length is reached leaving approximately ½ inch for ribbing *k1 p1* x 4 row bobble loosely in ribbing finishing weave in all ends close any gaps left where the thumb meets the body of the mitt abbreviations bobble bind off co cast on k knit kfbl knit into the front and back loop increase 1 stitch ktbl knit through back loop m1r make one increase to the right m1l make one increase to the left ndl needle p purl pm place marker sm slip marker st st stockinette stitch st stitch sts stitches copyright erica lueder & dreams in fiber 2018 for personal use only 4
